dcterms:creator: X. Tan
Y. Li
J. Liu
L. Jiang
dcterms:description: NUAA Photograph Imposter data set is one of the first publicly available data sets for face spoofing detection evaluation. Images in NUAA were collected by cheap webcams in three sessions on different environments and under different illumination conditions, with an interval of two weeks between each session. The evaluated attack is a printed photo, which can be flat or warped.
dcterms:title: NUAA Photograph Imposter

dcterms:creator: B. Peixoto
C. Michelassi
A. Rocha
dcterms:description: The Yale Recaptured data set was designed to have impostor images in multiple illumination conditions. Static images were collected with a distance of 50 centimeters between the display and the camera.
dcterms:title: Yale Recaptured

dcterms:creator: A. Anjos
S. Marcel
dcterms:description: The Print-Attack data set was used to benchmark different works in the first spoofing detection competition. This data set was created by showing a flat printed photo of a genuine user to an acquisition sensor in two ways: Hand-held or fixed support.
dcterms:title: Print-Attack

dcterms:creator: I. Chingovska
A. Anjos
S. Marcel
dcterms:description: Replay-Attack data set is an extension of the Print-Attack data set to evaluate spoofing in videos and photos. It consists of 1,300 video clips of photo and video attacks collected under different lighting conditions.
dcterms:title: Replay-Attack

dcterms:creator: Z. Zhang
J. Yan
S. Liu
Z. Lei
D. Yi
S. Li
dcterms:description: Casia Face Anti-Spoofing data set contains seven scenarios with different types of attack and a variety of image qualities. This data set presents three types of attacks: warped photo, eye-cut photo, and video playback.
dcterms:title: Casia Face Anti-Spoofing

dcterms:creator: N. Kose
J.-L. Dugelay
dcterms:description: Kose and Dugelay's data set is a paid-mask data set created by the MORPHO company. Subjects were captured by a 3D scanner that uses structured light technology to obtain genuine images of facial shape and texture.
dcterms:title: Kose and Dugelay

dcterms:creator: N. Erdogmus
S. Marcel
dcterms:description: 3D Mask Attack data set consists of video sequences recorded by an RGB-D camera. Masks were manufactured using the services of ThatsMyFace, requiring frontal and profile images of each subject.
dcterms:title: 3D Mask Attack

dcterms:creator: D. Menotti
G. Chiachia
A. Pinto
W.R. Schwartz
H. Pedrini
A.X. Falcão
A. Rocha
dcterms:description: MSU Mobile Face Spoofing data set consists of 280 video clips of print photo and video attack attempts to 35 participants. All printed photos used for attacks were created with a state-of-the-art color printer.
dcterms:title: MSU Mobile Face Spoofing

dcterms:creator: A. Pinto
H. Pedrini
W. R. Schwartz
A. Rocha
dcterms:description: Unicamp Video-Attack data set is comprised of videos of valid accesses and attacks of 404 subjects, all built at Full HD quality, recorded at 30 frames per second and nine seconds long.
dcterms:title: Unicamp Video-Attack
